titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL994_02
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL994_02

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

28.Zaydʾīl bin Gabanān of 29.Bawsān of the tribe of Gabʾān has ma- 30.rried and paid the bride price for Laḥayʾab fr- 31.om Gaza. 32.ʿAbd bin Riʾāb of Ṣamaʿ 33.of the tribe of Gabʾān has married 34.and paid the bride price for ʾAmat Shamas from 35.Egypt. 36.Khāmiʿ bin Ḥāmī of Ḥāmī 37.of the tribe of ʾAṣrum has married 38.and paid the bride price for ʿArabiyyat from Qēdār. 39.Zaydʾīl bin ʿAbd of Ẓay- 40.rān of the tribe of Mawqah has married 41.and paid the bride price for Badr from Egypt.

Zaydʾīl bin Gabanān of

of the tribe of ʾAṣrum has married

and paid the bride price for Badr from Egypt.
